plot: Through a retrospective approach, 'My Grandfather Drew Me a Map' recreates an emotional experience of a memory by pairing non-sync 16mm image and sound. The film reveals a catalyst for a journey of personal growth and cultural discovery.
title: My Grandfather Drew Me a Map: Chapter One
plot_es: Through a retrospective approach, 'My Grandfather Drew Me a Map' recreates an emotional experience of a memory by pairing non-sync 16mm image and sound. The film reveals a catalyst for a journey of personal growth and cultural discovery.
original_name: My Grandfather Drew Me a Map: Chapter One
plot_en: Through a retrospective approach, 'My Grandfather Drew Me a Map' recreates an emotional experience of a memory by pairing non-sync 16mm image and sound. The film reveals a catalyst for a journey of personal growth and cultural discovery.
